com.jdon.controller.cache
接口 Cache

所有已知实现类：
EncacheProvider, LRUCache
public interface Cache

Cache interface A Cache object is responsible for managing a collection of cached objects Given an ObjectKey object, a Cache object quickly finds the corresponding cached object. The Cache-Manager object passes an ObjectKey object to the Cache objects fetchObject method to get a cached object from the cache

@author banq
